text: @ImogenRadford @EnvAgency You have misunderstood the map then- many CSOs discharge when it hasn't been raining and there are many other sources of pollution that we can't map so we warn people of these other risk factors.

@ImogenRadford @gis_michelle @EnvAgency Example - this is treated effluent supposedly meeting the standards. Most treated sewage outfalls have nothing done to remove high levels of bacteria and a range of other nasty stuff. Most overflows marked also have such an effluent discharge 24/7. https://t.co/1TNt54cMyD

text: @lostplan @jeremypeet @EnvAgencySE It's too much sediment for that amount of discolouration. More likely a building site being dewatered to work on foundations or similar and discharging the water directly to the river - especially as it's not raining.

@BristolAvonRT @EnvAgency Thanks for the report. Working with @wessexwater we have identified a source of this #pollution as paint washing from an industrial unit on Parkway Trading Estate.. which should now be stopped. Please report any further #pollutions on 0800807060 - thanks
@VerValleySoc @jeremypeet @EnvAgencySE I've seen this too. Had wondered if it's from something innocent like dogs playing in the river. Do you think that's unlikely?

urls.title: audio-play
urls.description: Home Search / JBA Bentley supports EA to hit target of improving flood protection to 300,000 homes The Environment Agency has announced the fantastic news that 300,000 homes and properties have been better protected from the effects of climate change as a result of the government’s £ 2.6billion investment over the last six years. We at JBA Bentley are immensely proud of our role in supporting the EA in achieving this target. We have delivered projects that have contributed significantly to milestone,

text: @jbabentleyJV - our joint venture with @JBAConsulting - is really proud to have supported the @EnvAgency in achieving its target of protecting 300,000 homes and properties from the effects of climate change over the last six years 👏. Read more here 👉 https://t.co/vy7LA84Ar4 https://t.co/kDas5JzDN6
